summary: This document contains various records related to the subscriber history of a phone account associated with Sunshine Services Unlimited, including billing information and account changes. It also references a subpoena compliance request from Sprint Nextel regarding a case number, indicating the involvement of law enforcement. Additionally, there are mentions of MySpace comments and interactions, suggesting social media activity related to individuals connected to the case.

persons.name: Daniel Beale

persons.name: Larry M. Mesches

connections.description: Daniel Beale is associated with Sunshine Services Unlimited, where Larry M. Mesches serves as the registered agent.

events.title: Annual Report Filing
events.description: Sunshine Services Unlimited filed its annual report with the Florida Secretary of State, indicating changes in its registered office and registered agent.

events.title: MySpace Activity
events.description: Comments and interactions on MySpace related to an individual, indicating social engagement and possible connections to the case.

keyFacts: Daniel Beale is listed as an officer of Sunshine Services Unlimited.
Larry M. Mesches is the registered agent for Sunshine Services Unlimited.
The document includes a subpoena compliance request from Sprint Nextel.
There are multiple mentions of MySpace interactions, indicating social media activity related to individuals in the case.
